content: निवृत्त {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Returned, turned back. {@--2@} Gone, departed, vanished, disappeared. {@--3@} Ceased, refrained or abstained from, stopped, desisted; <ls>Ku. 1. 51.</ls> {@--4@} Abstaining from worldly acts, abstracted from this world, quiet. {@--5@} Repenting of improper conduct. {@--6@} Finished, completed, whole; see वृत् with नि. --त्तं {@--1@} Return. {@--2@} A mind free from the influence of passions.
